statements: DELETE FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 1 AND timeline_id = 1;
DELETE FROM project_milestones WHERE project_id = 1 AND milestone_name = 'Design Review';
DELETE FROM project_timelines WHERE project_id = 2 AND timeline_id = 5;
DELETE FROM project_timelines WHERE project_id = 5 AND start_date >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM project_teams WHERE project_id = 3 OR team_name = 'Engineering Team';
DELETE FROM project_teams WHERE team_name = 'Marketing Team';
DELETE FROM milestone_progress WHERE milestone_id = 'b0f73529-6611-4b9e-bb7b-2bcbf9263f9e' AND project_id = 'c50e38d0-6c37-4c8b-ae15-6e3d0974283a';
